venue.name: The Willimantic Brewing Co./Main Street Caf√©

item.description:
WHAT: Beer and food in the restaurant section of Willimantic Brewing Company. Feel free to come along and just have a beer or two, or something to eat as well if you wish! I just sampled their food and beer this week, and it was pretty awesome!

WHERE: Willimantic Brewing Company: 967 Main Street, Willimantic, CT 06226. Look for the pink table tent in the restaurant section, or ask the wait staff for the Meetup table.

WHEN: I'll be there from 6.30pm, December 10th, 2008. Feel free to turn up any time after that.

COST: you can see the drinks list here: http://www.willibrew.... (choose your drink of choice from down the right side of the page to see the prices) and the menu here: http://www.willibrew....

TRANSPORT: If you'd like to carpool or offer a ride do note this in your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a pink table tent in restaurant section/ask wait staff for meetup table

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Nibbles and Beer at the Willimantic Brewing Co
